name: Space Invaders (itch) (MarkusReynolds1989)
description:
One level of my Space Invaders clone. This is the first game I've ever made/finished and I started it with the help of the monogame tutorial. I've never used Monogame and I'm very excited to continue to develop with it.

I'm counting this as a finished "game" because there's a beginning, middle, and end, but the sky is the limit for what could be added to this. I intend to work on this more in the future.
